stone.util

Class StringBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • stone.util.StringBuilder

  • public class StringBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    StringBuilder implementing more or less the same functionality of util.StringBuilder
    Author:
    Nelphindal

    • Method Detail

      • appendFirst

        public final void appendFirst(char c)
        * Appends a char to the front. Succeeding calls of appendFirst('o'), appendFirst('o') and appendFirst('f') on a empty instance of StringBuilder will result in "foo".
        Parameters:
        c - char to append

      • appendFirst

        public final StringBuilder appendFirst(java.lang.String s)
        Appends a string to the front. Succeeding calls of appendFirst("foo") and appendFirst("bar") on a empty instance of StringBuilder will result in "barfoo".
        Parameters:
        s - String to append
        Returns:
        this

        public final int removeLast()
        Removes the last char and returns it.
        Returns:
        the removed char or -1 if this has been empty

      • set

        public final void set(java.lang.String s)
        Sets the content to s. It has equal effect like the calls clear() and append{First, Last}(s).
        Parameters:
        s -

      • substring

        public final void substring(int offset)
        Sets the contained string to start offset positions later. Unspecified behavior if offset is greater than actual length.
        Parameters:
        offset -

      • toLowerCase

        public final java.lang.String toLowerCase()
        Returns:

      • getLast

        protected final int getLast()
        Returns:
